Header: Madush arrest: Mohommad Siddeek out on bail
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Mohammad Siddeek Mohommad Siyam who was taken into custody after he was deported from Dubai has been released following interrogations. Sri Lanka Police stated that it was revealed Mohamed Siddeek had no criminal record, which led to his eventual release. However, Lanka Rajitha Perera who arrived in Sri Lanka with Siddeek has an outstanding warrant against him and the suspect was produced before the Negombo Magistrate Court.
